attributes.action: To hold the public inquiry into the Iraq war in public, not in private.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a total farce to hold the Iraq war inquiry in private when it is supposed to be a public enquiry. This must be heard in public so we the common people and the families of those who died for this cause can see if it was just. George Orwell would have been proud of the faceless people (elected?) who have made this shameless decision.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
